doc.title: My Name Is Karl
doc.plot: Karl appeared in summer of 2006 at a police office at the Mannheim central train station in southern Germany. He could not remember anything from his life. Later he recalled that his name was Karl. The German police contacted Interpol but there was no matching missing report, Nobody seemed to be missing him. 15month later the German police finally managed to identify Karl. But Karl found his own memories about his past.
